Html:
HI,
can I use atlserver to upload files and do http request in a COM STA object without freezing the app ? my COM object is a outlook addin made with ATL.
shall I use win32 threads to do my requests/responses with atlserver?
I want to do http requests (uploads of files too) without freezing the app...
I use visual studio 2013 and ATL.
or instead of atlserver shall I use win32 winhttp ?

bests regards
